tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ThreatData (
  threat_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  threat_name VARCHAR(255),
  threat_type VARCHAR(50),
  threat_date DATE,
  threat_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Attacks (
    attack_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    attack_date DATE,
    incident_id UUID REFERENCES Incidents(incident_id),
    attacker_id UUID REFERENCES Attackers(attacker_id),
    attack_details TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE ThreatActors (id INT, name STRING, description STRING, primary key (id));
CREATE TABLE AttackVectors (id INT, name STRING, threat_actor_id INT, description STRING, primary key (id), foreign key (threat_actor_id) references ThreatActors(id));
CREATE TABLE Targets (id INT, name STRING, description STRING, primary key (id));

CREATE TABLE Attacks (id INT, attack_vector_id INT, target_id INT, date DATE, description STRING, primary key (id), foreign key (attack_vector_id) references AttackVectors(id), foreign key (target_id) references Targets(id));
CREATE TABLE IncidentReports (id INT, attack_id INT, date DATE, summary STRING, primary key (id), foreign key (attack_id) references Attacks(id));
